about_the_game:
[h[h2] Game Introduction [/h2]
A new neighbor has moved in next door. Her skin is as smooth as cream, always with a lively and sweet smile. Her smooth hair hangs on the side of her neck, and further down comes her graceful figure
Her name is Haiman, and this name always comes to mind, captivating you.
In this seemingly ordinary world, your life is no longer ordinary because of this imaginary girlfriend.
The arrival of Haiman not only brings many romance and surprises to your life, but also brings a series of challenges and adventures, making you increasingly immersed in being with her. But you gradually realize that she doesn't seem as well behaved and charming as you imagine.

What secrets does Haiman have...?

Gameplay

Inheriting the gameplay of the previous Joy Life series, this Joy Life 4 also brings you a memory tested flip game. In the game, you need to flip the card by clicking on it to find two cards with exactly the same screen. If the screen is the same, it is a success, and the two cards will be eliminated; If the flipped cards are inconsistent, the game will not change in any way. When all the cards in the screen are eliminated, you can enter the next level. As the game progresses, unlock sweet interactions with your fantasy girlfriend, explore her secrets, and embark on a wonderful date with her.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Joy Life 4 is a card flipping game that tests memory. In the game, you need to flip the cards to find two cards with the same picture to eliminate them. If the cards are not consistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated.
